stories.text: I’ve noticed that I have mental (and perhaps physical) fatigue when I spent a lot of time online. I don’t yet have a theory as to why, but I’m curious if this translates to other people’s experience with social media / online.
stories.title: Ask HN: Does social media use lead to mental/physical fatigue?
